original_comment: The Supreme Court granted the writ petition due to violation of fundamental rights under Article 21 of the Constitution. The bench observed that the right to life includes the right to live with dignity.
clause: The Supreme Court granted the writ petition due to violation of fundamental rights under Article 21 of the Constitution. The bench observed that the right to life includes the right to live with dignity.
reason: legal_basis: Article 21 of the Constitution | causation: violation of fundamental rights under Article 21 of the Constitution
key_phrases: right, supreme court, court granted

original_comment: The High Court dismissed the appeal finding no merit in the arguments presented by the counsel. The court noted that the evidence was insufficient to prove the claims.
